   sphinx-quickstart on Wed Aug 21st 2025.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Metadata Transformations Framework
=========================

Provide foundational event class types designed for easy extension by derivative classes, enabling consistent event handling and customisation.

Description
=========================

This package provides a suite of extensible event classes for structured JSON logging across diverse environments. It enables consistent event representation, simplifies integration, and supports customisation for specific application needs.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

Dependencies
=========================

* adaptiveio>=2.0.3

=========================
